snippet.title: Gravity Rush Trailer
snippet.description:
This video trailer shows Gravity Rush in live action. See the effects of what would happen in the real world if you had the power to affect gravity.

http://us.playstation.com/psvita/games-and-media/psv-gravity-rush.html

©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment  Inc. "Gravity Rush" is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
